page.title: 18PRIMARY SCHOOL, CIRENCESTER.
page.content: A primary school day starts at 09.00 and ends at 15.40. We have two breaks one at 10.45 until 11.00. The other one is from midday until 13.25. During that time we eat our lunch. We have a maths lesson every morning, and P.E. every day. We write a story once a week. There are six classes in the school, 5 of the teachers are ladies the other is a man, We also have a headmaster. There are about 29 children in each class. Our school uniform is a grey or navy blue skirt for the girls, grey or black trousers for the boys. Grey, white, or shirt for everyone, with a plain jumper on top. We only wear school uniform for special occasions like music concerts, carol service or harvest festival.
